pr_title: Add integration tests for client side cache

timeline.message: add integration tests for client side cache

timeline.author: apc999

replies.bodyText: I am fine removing it here since we test the cache indirectly through offline read. I wouldn't rule out using implementation details in integration tests where it is hard to verify results just through the public interface.
replies.author: bf8086

timeline.bodyText: same here, page becomes implementation details which should be hidden from Stream APIs. Similar comments on the other test cases
timeline.author: apc999

timeline.bodyText: Once we removed try (ReadableByteChannel channel = mCacheManager.get(new PageId(status.getFileId(), 0))) {...} we should be asserting only on the pages just read?
timeline.author: apc999
